EmailTemplate.name: WBN-202209-HHS-HAC-HWBR-Virtual-Nursing-Webinar.follow-up-non-attendees
EmailTemplate.subject: Virtual nursing webinar recording now available
EmailTemplate.textOnly: WEBINAR Virtual nursing: How to address staffing challenges with a virtual care solution We’re sorry you missed our recent webinar about how virtual nursing can help alleviate staffing shortages. The good news is that we recorded the presentation and have it available for you to access anytime! Feel free to watch, share and let us know if you have any questions about any of our virtual care solutions. Watch our on-demand webinar to: - Understand the trends of how hospitals and health systems are addressing nurse staffing challenges with virtual care - Learn the value of integrating an in-person and virtual care hybrid model with inpatient care delivery - Hear how leading health systems are implementing virtual nursing and the positive impact they’re seeing About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
